video.title: Merlin
video.synopsis: This family-oriented retelling of the King Arthur legend finds Merlin arriving in Camelot, where he hones his magic skills with the help of his uncle.

episodes.synopsis: Merlin, a young country boy, arrives in the bustling, colorful city of Camelot and witnesses an execution.
episodes.title: The Dragon's Call

episodes.synopsis: An evil knight named Valiant rides into Camelot and enters the annual sword-fighting tournament, where he'll face the reigning champion, Arthur.
episodes.title: Valiant

episodes.synopsis: A plague invades Camelot, and Gaius and Merlin attempt to find its source. Merlin wants to cure the disease with magic, but Gaius says it's too risky.
episodes.title: The Mark of Nimueh

episodes.synopsis: The witch Nimueh plots her revenge on Merlin by posing as a servant girl and infiltrating a party in Camelot to poison him.
episodes.title: The Poisoned Chalice

episodes.synopsis: When Merlin is attacked by a terrifying creature with the body of a lion and head of an eagle, a young stranger appears to fight the monster off.
episodes.title: Lancelot

episodes.synopsis: An enchanted beetle crawls into Lady Morgana's head, causing her to fall extremely ill. Unaware that the disease is magical, Gaius is unable to help.
episodes.title: A Remedy to Cure All Ills

episodes.synopsis: Morgana becomes concerned when she dreams that Arthur is murdered by a young girl. Arthur then falls in love with the girl from her dream.
episodes.title: The Gates of Avalon

episodes.synopsis: When a Druid and his apprentice are caught, they make a desperate bid for freedom. During the chase, Merlin hears the boy's telepathic cries for help.
episodes.title: The Beginning of the End

episodes.synopsis: At Arthur's coming-of-age ceremony, the celebration is suddenly interrupted when a mysterious black knight crashes the proceedings.
episodes.title: Excalibur

episodes.synopsis: Merlin is stunned when his mother arrives in Camelot bruised, battered and desperate for help. Their village has been attacked by a ruthless bandit.
episodes.title: The Moment of Truth

episodes.synopsis: The knights of Camelot cheer when Arthur slays a unicorn, but a curse descends on their city. Anhora reveals that Arthur unleashed the curse.
episodes.title: The Labyrinth of Gedref

episodes.synopsis: When Gwen's father, Tom, agrees to help a renegade sorcerer turn lead into gold, he's arrested and faces certain death.
episodes.title: To Kill the King

episodes.synopsis: Arthur encounters a huge, terrifying monster with a fatal bite. When it strikes Arthur just before Merlin arrives, Arthur's death is nearly certain.
episodes.title: Le Morte d'Arthur

episodes.synopsis: New servant Cedric muscles in as Arthur's right-hand man and turns the prince against his friend. Merlin is convinced the newcomer is up to something.
episodes.title: The Curse of Cornelius Sigan

episodes.synopsis: Arthur is determined to win Camelot's jousting tournament on his own merit, so he goes undercover as an commoner; a bounty hunter arrives in Camelot.
episodes.title: The Once and Future Queen

episodes.synopsis: When Morgana's nightmares spill into waking hours, she becomes terrified she has magic. But Gaius keeps her in the dark for her own good.
episodes.title: The Nightmare Begins

episodes.synopsis: Gwen is mistaken for Morgana and kidnapped by a savage outlaw. Uther refuses to pay her ransom, so Arthur heads out to fight for Gwen's freedom.
episodes.title: Lancelot and Guinevere

episodes.synopsis: Uther is captivated by his latest guest, Lady Catrina. Arthur is appalled by his flirting, but Merlin is wary for another reason.
episodes.title: Beauty and the Beast: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Newly crowned Queen Catrina settles in as Camelot's first lady. As her true nature surfaces, Merlin must find a way to expose her.
episodes.title: Beauty and the Beast: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Uther is determined to wipe out magic once and for all, and summons a dreaded witchfinder. Gaius impresses upon Merlin the danger he's in.
episodes.title: The Witchfinder

episodes.synopsis: When a mysterious warrior challenges Arthur to a duel, no one could predict the chain of events that is set in motion.
episodes.title: The Sins of the Father

episodes.synopsis: When Merlin discovers a beautiful druid girl trapped in a bounty hunter's cage, he must help her escape. Merlin's intense new friendship is tested.
episodes.title: The Lady of the Lake

episodes.synopsis: Dignitaries from rival kingdoms descend on Camelot for peace talks, but King Alined will do everything in his power to stir up hostilities.
episodes.title: Sweet Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Uther has a precious magical relic locked up tight in the Camelot vaults that many have lost their lives trying to reclaim.
episodes.title: The Witch's Quickening

episodes.synopsis: When the Fires of Idirsholas burn for the first time in 300 years, Gaius fears a sorcerer has revived the deadly Knights of Medhir.
episodes.title: The Fires of Idirsholas

episodes.synopsis: The last Dragonlord is the key to Merlin's past as well as the future of Camelot, but will Arthur and Merlin find him in time to save the kingdom?
episodes.title: The Last Dragonlord

episodes.synopsis: The despondent prince is all but ready to give up searching for the missing Lady Morgana -- but then a bruised, bloodied figure emerges from the mist.
episodes.title: The Tears of Uther Pendragon: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While Merlin heals from the Serket's poison, Morgana and Morgause continue their evil plan by persuading Uther's enemy, Cenred, to invade Camelot.
episodes.title: The Tears of Uther Pendragon: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Merlin accidentally releases a goblin that possesses Gaius, leading the once-wise physician to develop a taste for gold, ale and magical jokes.
episodes.title: Goblin's Gold

episodes.synopsis: Merlin and Arthur find themselves outnumbered in a bar brawl, but an enigmatic young man helps them prevail, risking his life to protect the prince.
episodes.title: Gwaine

episodes.synopsis: Merlin has a meeting with the wizened old sorcerer Taliesin, who takes the young warlock to the crystal cave and shows him a glimpse of the future.
episodes.title: The Crystal Cave

episodes.synopsis: As Arthur is pressured into an arranged marriage with a visiting princess, the suspicious Merlin discovers that she may not be who she claims to be.
episodes.title: The Changeling

episodes.synopsis: Gwen faces a terrible dilemma when she's forced to choose between her estranged brother and Arthur, with one of them certain to die at Cenred's hand.
episodes.title: The Castle of Fyrien

episodes.synopsis: To prove himself worthy of the Camelot throne, Arthur embarks on a solitary quest to retrieve the Golden Trident from the Fisher King.
episodes.title: The Eye of the Phoenix

episodes.synopsis: Merlin is forced to tell Gaius about the evil intent of Alice, his recently returned former love, after learning she's under a Manticore's influence.
episodes.title: Love in the Time of Dragons

episodes.synopsis: Tormented by dreams of Guinevere becoming Queen of Camelot, Morgana -- exhorted by Morgause -- decides to reveal Arthur and Gwen's courtship to Uther.
episodes.title: Queen of Hearts

episodes.synopsis: As Camelot's famed tournament gets under way, the city fills with warriors who are joined by a young man with a secret weapon to help him win: magic.
episodes.title: The Sorcerer's Shadow

episodes.synopsis: Merlin and Arthur are sent on a dangerous mission to capture the Cup of Life, a powerful magic artifact that possesses the gift of immortality.
episodes.title: The Coming of Arthur: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With Morgause's immortal army at her command, Morgana begins a reign of terrible evil over the innocent citizens of Camelot.
episodes.title: The Coming of Arthur: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Morgana wrenches open the gates to the Other World, only one thing is certain: Nothing will ever be the same again.
episodes.title: The Darkest Hour: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With Merlin on the brink of death, who will stop Arthur from making the ultimate sacrifice to save his precious Camelot?
episodes.title: The Darkest Hour: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A carnival to celebrate Prince Arthur's birthday hides a deadly foe who promises to strike at the very heart of Camelot.
episodes.title: The Wicked Day

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious visitor arrives in Camelot seeking a very special prize: a dragon's egg.
episodes.title: Aithusa

episodes.synopsis: For the first time since his coronation, Arthur finds out what it's really like to be king.
episodes.title: His Father's Son

episodes.synopsis: A desperate Morgana finds the unlikeliest of assassins: Merlin.
episodes.title: A Servant of Two Masters

episodes.synopsis: Morgana will stop at nothing in her hunt for Emrys.
episodes.title: The Secret Sharer

episodes.synopsis: Merlin finds himself fighting for survival against an unseen enemy more deadly than he could possibly imagine...
episodes.title: Lamia

episodes.synopsis: Camelot rejoices at the return of a long-lost friend: Sir Lancelot.
episodes.title: Lancelot du Lac

episodes.synopsis: The discovery of a shrine in the woods unearths a haunting secret from Camelot's past.
episodes.title: A Herald of the New Age

episodes.synopsis: Arthur's plans for the future are thrown into disarray by the return of Gwen.
episodes.title: The Hunter's Heart

episodes.synopsis: Arthur and Merlin are forced to run for their lives as a merciless Morgana attacks Camelot.
episodes.title: The Sword in the Stone: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With Camelot lost to Morgana, Merlin has to go to extraordinary lengths to restore Arthur's belief in himself.
episodes.title: The Sword in the Stone: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As the forces of fate cast a shadow over Camelot, Merlin must confront his darkest fears.
episodes.title: Arthur's Bane: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Ancient prophecies of Mordred weigh heavy on Merlin.
episodes.title: Arthur's Bane: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Arthur risks everything when he summons a spirit from the dead - Uther.
episodes.title: The Death Song of Uther Pendragon

episodes.synopsis: Morgana conjures up a deception so powerful that the whole of Camelot is taken in.
episodes.title: Another's Sorrow

episodes.synopsis: When Arthur angers the ancient Disir, Merlin must make the hardest decision of his life.
episodes.title: The Disir

episodes.synopsis: Morgana uses Gwen to lure Arthur into a deadly trap, imprisoning her in the Dark Tower.
episodes.title: The Dark Tower

episodes.synopsis: King Arthur is the target of a dangerous assassin - his wife and queen, Guinevere.
episodes.title: A Lesson in Vengeance

episodes.synopsis: As a deadly net closes in around Arthur, Merlin finds himself far from Camelot.
episodes.title: The Hollow Queen

episodes.synopsis: Merlin risks everything to put an end to Morgana's control over Gwen.
episodes.title: With All My Heart

episodes.synopsis: Morgana leads a terrifying manhunt in pursuit of her old foe Alator of the Catha.
episodes.title: The Kindness of Strangers

episodes.synopsis: A troubled Mordred must choose between love and loyalty.
episodes.title: The Drawing of the Dark

episodes.synopsis: Merlin finds himself facing the future he's fought so long to avoid.
episodes.title: The Diamond of the Day: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As the great battle rages on Camlann's mighty plain, Merlin faces his moment of destiny.
episodes.title: The Diamond of the Day: Part 2
